@graph.name: Vegan Stuffed Shells with Spinach - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These vegan stuffed shells with spinach make such a delicious dinner! They're filled with spinach and vegan ricotta made of cauliflower and tofu. Nobody will believe that these stuffed shells are vegan!

@graph.headline: Vegan Stuffed Shells with Spinach

@graph.name: Vegan Stuffed Shells with Spinach
@graph.description: These vegan stuffed shells with spinach make such a delicious dinner! They're filled with spinach and vegan ricotta made of cauliflower and tofu. Nobody will believe that these stuffed shells are vegan!
recipeIngredient: 8 oz tofu, drained ((no silken tofu! Regular or firm tofu) )

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta jumbo shells according to the instructions on the package. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta jumbo shells according to the instructions on the package. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients for the vegan cauliflower ricotta in a blender. Blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients for the vegan cauliflower ricotta in a blender. Blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium-sized pan, sauté the spinach. Transfer to a bowl and stir in the vegan ricotta. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium-sized pan, sauté the spinach. Transfer to a bowl and stir in the vegan ricotta. Season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Put some tomato sauce in a baking dish, so the bottom is covered. Place the cooked shells in the baking dish and carefully spoon the ricotta spinach mixture into the cooked pasta shells.
recipeInstructions.name: Put some tomato sauce in a baking dish, so the bottom is covered. Place the cooked shells in the baking dish and carefully spoon the ricotta spinach mixture into the cooked pasta shells.

recipeInstructions.text: Add some more tomato sauce on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Add some more tomato sauce on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 25 - 30 minutes at 350 °F. Sprinkle with fresh basil leaves and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 25 - 30 minutes at 350 °F. Sprinkle with fresh basil leaves and enjoy!

@graph.keywords: recipe for vegan stuffed shells, vegan stuffed shells
